title: OCE Merch Store - Paypal purchases
body:
Just curious if anyone else has made a purchase on the OCE Merch Store via PayPal.
I put an order in this morning for a couple of things and the PayPal transaction is still sitting at pending. I don't think I've ever had a transaction take this long via PayPal. It's always pretty instant for me.

Is this normal for Riot Games Hong Kong transactions?

replies.body: If I recall right it can take between 3 - 5 days to process, at least with Westpac, I get it in Monday morning and it's ready by Thursday morning.

On second thought I forgot my PayPal is set as an instant Bank Transfer which means it may take a while depending on the bank I guess....
But I've never had it happen before, so it's a little strange.

If it's still like this tomorrow I'll be asking some questions. Apparently shipping is 3-4 days so as long as it it processed by tomorrow that's the main thing.
